title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, when an image is loaded, scrollbars are enabled.
EB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, when an image is loaded, scrollbars should be disabled to prevent scrolling.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Load an image.
3. Observe the behavior of the scrollbars. Expectedly, the scrollbars should be disabled and not allow scrolling.
